name: The Pool In The Sewer
description:
You stand in water to your waist.  To the north is the entrance to this
room.  A single door leads east.

exits.description: To the north you see the entrance to this room.
You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.
exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 7053 S #7048 The Sewers~    You stand in a dead end of the sewer.  The only way out is south. You can see a shaft leading up but it looks too difficult to go up that way.
